Package pvz.unit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MoveableUnit  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bullet
    This is an abstract superclass for all bullets in the game.
    BulletFactory  
    ConeZombie
    The Cone head type of zombie.
    Cooldown  
    DefensivePlant
    Abstract superclass for plants who's only function is to abosrb damange (they cannot shoot or move).
    FlagZombie
    The Flag head type of zombie.
    GeneratorPlant
    Abstract super class for plants that generate sun for the Field they are on.
    NormalZombie
    The most basic type of zombie.
    OffensivePlant
    This class is the abstract superclass for all plant types which shoot a projectile at zombies.
    PeaBullet
    Concrete class of Bullet which does a specific amount of damage and causes no secondary effects on the Zombie it hits.
    PeaShooterPlant
    This class contains the data for making a standard peashooter class.
    PerishableUnit  
    Plant
    Abstract super class for all plants.
    PlantData
    Encapsulate the data for creating the plant
    PlantFactory
    Factory class for the Plant, it creates an instance of the plant needed using the mapping found in plantTable
    SunflowerPlant  
    SunGenerator  
    Unit  
    WallnutPlant
    This class does nothing other than stop zombies from moving forward until its HP is depleted.
    Zombie
    This class is the parent of all zombie types. It contains default information shared by several of its subclasses.
    ZombieFactory
    This class is for creating instances of classes extending Zombie.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Bullet.Type
    Types of bullets
    Plant.Type
    The possible types a plant can have
    Zombie.Status
    The status the zombie can be affected by
    Zombie.Type
    The type of zombies
